title: Chinaman: The Legend of Pradeep Mathew
description: Some remember his impressive career stats ... others recall his on-field arrogance. Some say he fixed matches . . . others say he was dropped for being Tamil! Who exactly was Pradeep Mathew? And what became of him?WG Karunasena, a man who spent 64 years drinking arrack and watching cricket decides to find out ...If you have never seen a cricket match; or if you have and it has made you snore ...If you canâ€™t understand why anyone would watch, let alone obsess over this dull game ...... then this IS the book for you
author: Shehan Karunatilaka
